title: HASP CMS Configuration
description: Configuration schema for HASP CMS prebuild operations

prebuildJSONS.description: List of JSON endpoints to fetch and cache during prebuild

name.description: Unique identifier filename for this JSON resource

endpoint.description: URL endpoint to fetch the JSON data from

outputPath.description: Relative path where the JSON file will be saved

useDeserialization.description: Whether to apply deserialization to the fetched data

prebuildImages.description: List of images to download during prebuild

url.description: URL of the image to download

filename.description: Name to save the file as

downloadPath.description: Relative path where the image will be saved
